[@microsoft/fast-components](./fast-components.md) &gt; [fastDisclosure](./fast-components.fastdisclosure.md)

## fastDisclosure variable

A function that returns a [Disclosure](./fast-foundation.disclosure.md) registration for configuring the component with a DesignSystem. Implements [disclosureTemplate](./fast-foundation.disclosuretemplate.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fastDisclosure: (overrideDefinition?: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").OverrideFoundationElementDefinition<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationDisclosure;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationDisclosure, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
}> | undefined) => import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementRegistry<{
    baseName: string;
    baseClass: typeof FoundationDisclosure;
    template: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ViewTemplate<FoundationDisclosure, any>, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
    styles: import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementTemplate<import("@microsoft/fast-element").ElementStyles, import("@microsoft/fast-foundation").FoundationElementDefinition>;
}, typeof Disclosure>
```

## Remarks

Generates HTML Element: `<fast-Disclosure>`
